body_html:
[Off-topic] @fchollet I note that more and more issues are a little bit duplicated after keras gone in the tf namespace. I think it is quite natural that people are a little bit cofused on where to report issues. I think that TF is a special case backend that it is also a sort of frontend in tf.keras. Of course keras is the upstream but this frontend/backend/frontend loop confuse many users.

EDIT:
Just to mention another case #10215

body:
[Off-topic] @fchollet I note that more and more issues are a little bit duplicated after keras gone in the tf namespace. I think it is quite natural that people are a little bit cofused on where to report issues. I think that TF is a special case backend that it is also a sort of frontend in tf.keras. Of course keras is the upstream but this frontend/backend/frontend loop confuse many users.

EDIT:
Just to mention another case https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/10215
